extendedInfo.description: TouchPal Keyboard, Feel the speed!The Winner of Global Mobile Innovation Award!The Best Contextual prediction and Sliding Input perfectly combines, makes TouchPal the FASTEST keyboard in the world!Coolest look and feel, highly customizable (multiple skins, multiple layouts)!Innovative features & shortcuts !UNIQUE TECHNOLOGIES:1. TouchPal CurveÂ® - the best sliding input experience.2. Contextual prediction saves up to 80% keystrokes.4. Mistyping correction on QWERTY.5. Multiple skins available.6. Toolbar plugins (Twitter plugin).7. Gesture shortcuts (slide up/down) for numbers/punctuations.OTHER FEATURES:- Multi languages support (download language packs after installation)- Numbers of delicate themes for you to choose - Outstanding dictionary with online update - Import contact list to your user dictionary- Backup/restore user dictionary in SD card- Voice input (Android 2.2+)SUPPORTED LANGUAGES: (Restrict)**Before download new version, please make sure your input language included in below listï¼**-----------------------Bulgarian-Catalan -Chinese Simplified Handwriting-Chinese Simplified Pinyin-Chinese Simplified Stroke-Chinese Simplified Wubi-Chinese Traditional BoPoMoFo-Chinese Traditional Cangjie-Chinese Traditional Simple Cangjie-Croatian-Czech-Danish-Dutch-English -English (UK)-English (USA)-Finnish-French -German-Hindi -Italian -Polish-Portuguese-Br-Portuguese-Pt-Romanian -Russian -Slovak -Slovenian -Spanish-Swedish-Turkish-Ukrainian----------------------INSTALLATION:After installation, choose "TouchPal Keyboard" in the "Setting" => "Language & input"; then long press in any input field or pull down the notification bar to enable âChoose input methodâ and select "TouchPal Keyboard". PRIVACY POLICY:We take your privacy seriously. TouchPal Keyboard is the GSMA award winner, and it does not collect your private data including password or credit card info. The warning message when you enable the keyboard is a standard message in Android for ANY third-party keyboard app. Refer to our privacy policy at www.touchpal.com/privacypolicy.html.FREE LICENSE:It will NOT expire. It has NO Ads. Yes, it's 100% free! We may charge the additional language packs and advanced versions in the future. But this version is free. If you like it and like it to be free, don't forget to rate it!Free license is only for personal use. If you are a device manufacturer and want to preload TouchPal Keyboard, please contact us for licensing terms.To be eligible for a free upgrade to our future paid apps (language packs or PRO/Tablet version), fan us on Facebook (search "TouchPal") and follow us on Twitter @TouchPal.======FAQ:Q: When I upgrade to newer version, how come my language packs are not working?A: Once the languages model optimized, you will receive an update notice when keyboard is enabled at first time. Or you can manually update the new language packs from TouchPal Settings-> Languages.Q: Why does it need Internet/voice/contact access?A: It will check updates and download language packs. It does have speech recognition (for some models). And it will import contact names into the dictionary (in some languages).If you'd like to help us improve your local language, or if you'd like to help us add a new language, don't forget to contact us at touchpal_keyboard.feedback@cootek.cn, with the email subject "[your language] volunteer". Thanks!======We sincerely recommend you another TouchPal product: TouchPal Contacts. TouchPal Contacts helps you find contacts and make calls easily and quickly. ~~~~~~~Follow us on Twitter: @TouchPalFan us on Facebook: Search "TouchPal"Website: www.touchpal.com======keywordsï¼Keyboard PinYin Wubi handwriting Dutch French German Indonesian Italian Portuguese Brazil Russian Spanish Swedish Thai Chinese Bopomofo input search message SMS SNS android contact message messaging messenger chat business card communication fast efficient favorite

reviews.title: S2
reviews.comment: Great keyboard!   Does exactly as it says on the tin.  Fast, reliable and accurate.  Love the statistics that it provides.
reviews.author: George Prentice

reviews.title: Needs to be more perfect
reviews.comment: Please and swipe up the keyboard  for capitalization. Like Swype .It\'s a very good feature. Also add space by sliding to space key,it will make the complete sentence writing easier. Otherwise it is perfect. All the best
reviews.author: rahul kumar

reviews.title: Excellent app. , but it needs to have more languages available
reviews.comment: Very Good application i am using it from a long time but this update have no arabic language , it was available before , i have sent before and asked if this can be available soon , but no response so i hope you take it seeiously and respond to my request and add arabic language , thanks for the app. ,and thanks in advance for help
reviews.author: Mohamed Mekky

reviews.title: Used to be great but sucks now
reviews.comment: Predictive text, auto correct, slide and voice dictation - all in one app.  It was the best keyboard app before and now it\'s even better.  Recent updates removed the ability to type in all capital letters.  Please restore.  The dictionary has crap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is a very good input app!!  Fast and simple
reviews.comment: But there is no emoji plugin that is kinda not good or else\'s I will. Give 5 stars
reviews.author: Jenny Zhang

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Hi, I admit that it is a good application but every time after using 2 weeks or so, it will force close without warning even after clearing data. It will work fine after reinstalling. Samsung S3.
reviews.author: Kenji Chan

reviews.title: ZTE WARP SEQUENT.
reviews.comment: My keyboard crashed about a week and a half ago. I did the update the other day to see if they fixed it, but didn\'t. Highly upset!
reviews.author: Basha Terry

reviews.title: It\'s Goooood :-)
reviews.comment: I just love this keypad.. makes texting so very easy n smooth :-) but more skins wud be nice:-)
reviews.author: Sheetal Rao

reviews.title: Thanx
reviews.comment: Great keyboard it is just smooth and simple. I really was shocked when the new update came with no Arabic package. I will be waiting for Arabic in 12 keys format. Thanx alot

reviews.title: great but....
reviews.comment: i really want a way to get rid of the prediction line at the top!! it\'s just taking up extra space! i love the T12 layout but I can\'t find what I need anywhere, I have a small screen and big hands and it takes up half the screen :(
reviews.author: Creakniffe Lacour

reviews.title: The Best Keyboard ever
reviews.comment: Actually touchpal keyboard is the easiest way to write on your phone , i would give it 5 stars if it has Arabic language , the old version had Arabic Language ,but after i installed the last update the Arabic Language is not available anymore , i hope you take this problem in consideration and add more languages
reviews.author: ramy talaat

reviews.title: Not working in Samsung S3
reviews.comment: Touchpal has been my favorite keyboard from past one year .. now it suddenly stopped working :( All my dictionary words personal words are stored here .. now it has become difficult to use any other key board .. please fix the issue soon :( :( :(
reviews.author: Madhu Sai

reviews.title: Spam garbage!
reviews.comment: This is my favorite keyboard app but it keeps downloading and saving pictures and other trash on my phone. Please fix before I hang myself. You have 7 days.
reviews.author: Joshua Rumbolt

reviews.title: Not so great now
reviews.comment: Had to change my rating.. randomly stops auto capitalizing first letter of sentence. Have to uninstall/reinstall to make it happen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Malay and Indonesia Dictionary with Next Word Prediction
reviews.comment: Please reinstate your Bahasa Indonesia and Bahasa Melayu (Malay) dictionary. I have previous version 5.4.4.42579 on my smartphone and the dictionary\'s working fine. At least give me a choice to install previous version on my tablet too.. THANKS..!!
reviews.author: Joe Rasid

reviews.title: Arabic pack please!
reviews.comment: This keyboard is amazing and the best ever!! I have been using it in Arabic too, but no longer! Please next update include in it Arabic, otherwise I\'m uninstalling it and gonna use any keyboard in this market that contains Arabic.
reviews.author: hassan hassoon

reviews.title: Great job
reviews.comment: Just fix the Arabic question mark.. it\'s a vertical flip of the English \"? \" not horizontal as the current one.  Thanks for the great work :)))
reviews.author: Ahmed Magdy

reviews.title: Love(d) it
reviews.comment: I\'ve loved this keyboard a lot. Used it on lg optimus and lenovo p700i. Rated it 5 stars.  But since i took my lenovo p770, its been buggy. I got version 4.8 pre installed. Can\'t update.
reviews.author: Shijo Jose

reviews.title: Request: Support for Norwegian
reviews.comment: Otherwise, seems like a great alternative to some of the more \"flashy\" keyboards out there.
reviews.author: Marius Laache

reviews.title: Fix now
reviews.comment: Fixit now it\'s beyond buggy
reviews.author: Kam Raine
